review:
this one of the best movie of salman khan (2007) the songs of partner mind-blowing and impressive . i'm waiting for partner 2 to released soon in the near future . in the sequel they need to improve better than the first film with action scenes and comedy scenes should be there in partner 2 who will reprise their roles from the first film 
salman khan
govinda
lara dutta 
the rest of them unknown ??
i will give 🌟🌟🌟🌟 🌟 🌟🌟 out of 10

the story has a good plot but the way prem insults bhaskar is not very funny. i would also like to add that this movie is remake of the 2005 film hitch. and trust me here friends the original is definitely better

i have never such a horribel comedy movie like partner. no story was there at all. acting cum jokery was there a lot. dosnt make sense.
a remake of hitch. that's what this is. lazy bollywood recycling movie ideas... that aside, is it enjoyable? aside from the cheesiness that comes with bollywood productions, sure...
